notes.text:
This update for nodejs8 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2021-22930: http2: fixes use after free on close in stream canceling (bsc#1188917).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: Node.js before 16.6.0, 14.17.4, and 12.22.4 is vulnerable to a use after free attack where an attacker might be able to exploit the memory corruption, to change process behavior.
notes.title: CVE description
